abstracts.cdata!:
The project aims at reorganizing and
            strengthening the institution responsible for
            telecommunications services as a first step towards: (1)
            improvement of its financial situation and of the existing
            services; as well as (2) a sound long-term development of
            the sector. Because the government requested that the post
            be kept under the same entity as telecommunications, postal
            services would also be included in this effort. The project
            would include the following components: (a) establishment of
            a new post and telecommunications (P&T) Entity with
            legal and financial autonomy; (b) preparation of a 5-year
            investment program for the P&T Entity; and (c)
            improvement of technical training at the P&T school in Yaounde.
